actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to terminate the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, wives, and widows, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Terminates the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, wives, and widows.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, wives, and widows, and for other purposes.
